page.title: 03EDMONDSLEY,BLACKHOUSE
page.content: EDMONDSLEY was once a ROMAN CAMP.It was given to WILLIAM EDMONDSLEY by WILLIAM 1 until 1382.In 1632 it was given to a family called WARDELL. A BRONZE_AGE shield was found in a burn(stream).The parish church found a STONE_AGE dish.The old school celebrated 100 years in 1975 and a new NURSERY SCHOOL was built 7 years ago. Edmondsley is not a very busy place and has a very good bus service.Most people go to DOCTORS at SACRISTON. BLACKHOUSE was built by Mr.CLAYTON in the 1920's.It was demolished in 1979 and the people were re-housed on a new housing estate at EDMONDSLEY.The land is now used for cropgrowing.The working mens club is still used.
